text.choose_point_menu: Select an item from the menu

ma_file.name: Working with .maFile
ma_file.drag: Drag and drop files into this field
ma_file.hint: Upload files with the extension .maFile to this field, or select a file by clicking on the button

password_file.name: Setting a password
password_file.hint: You can upload a file with passwords, the contents of which should be in the format login:password

hero_action.title: Priority Heroes
hero_action.hint: To change a specific hero, click on it and make a choice. If you want to reset your specific choice, click on the cross, a random hero will be selected

drop_account.title: Drop account
drop_account.description: Are you sure you want to delete the selected accounts?

success.name: Success
success.ma_file: Perhaps these accounts already exist, or the files are not valid!
success.import: Accounts successfully imported! Wait while background authorization and account validation occurs
success.auth: Account '%s' has been successfully authorized! The user is available to work.

warning.name: Warning!
warning.not_all_account: Not all accounts had a password found in the file you provided.

failure.name: An error has occurred
failure.ma_file: The files you selected are not .maFile, please select other files
failure.passwords_not_found: No passwords were found in this file for the accounts you are importing.
